page.title: 18Local Residents LISVANE
page.content: We interviewed 3 local residents. 1.Sidney Parker moved here to be school caretaker.He has seen vast changes over the last 24 years.Then it was very rural.It still retains some village atmostsphere but it is slowly disappearing. 2.Christopher Williams born here 20 years ago,is the local Disc Jockey. Educated in the local schools.When he was young itwas a closed community but now more houses have been built.He remembers the M4 motorway being built.He thinks there could be more leisure facilities and a better bus service. 3.Michael Oldham born in Plymouth in 1947 came to run the local mini-market.Finds the area constantly changing,people moving in and out of the area.Enjoys the local festivals.
